views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10 (should be compatible with iOS 9).
It should work on iOS 11 but I'm unable to test it .

NoFade is a simple tweak to stop the song durations labels in the now playing view from disappearing

No options to configure
No screen shot

If you need any support or would like to report a bug could you please kindly email me with the problem (my email will be in the "Author" button above this description) or DM me on Twitter @BLINGSTA69
